description:
When we met Gabe, he described himself as a "little bisexual."
At that point, he had only been with one guy, whom he fucked. He said he really enjoyed the experience and was looking forward to doing it again.
However, he has never BEEN fucked. So Gabe is a little unusual in that he's had a bit of experience, and wants more. A very cool place to be!
It had been a while since I'd seen Pete. He said he'd been hitting the gym hard, and I was excited to see how it had been working out.
When he arrived, I was amazed! He's packed on a lot of muscle!
"Wow!" I said. "How did you do it?"
"Lots of calories and twice a day in the gym," he said.
He's working toward competing in a bodybuilding contest.
"I want to put on a bit more weight and then I'll be really," he said. "I'm excited!"
He was also excited to meet Gabe, and I think Gabe liked what he saw too.
Pete tends to be more of a bottom, but with his new, bigger frame he liked the idea of fucking the shit out of a smaller guy.
And, of course, Gabe wanted to get fucked.
However, as things got started, they decided they wanted to do both and so they flip-flopped!
title: Gabe & Pete
